description.text:
Champion! Something awful has happened. 
The $(b;winter)Shadow Court$() has returned and their $(b;winter)Enderman$() have stolen the $(b;summer)Elytra$()!
Why you looking so confused at me? 
Ow right....hmm where to begin!
The Elytra is the property of the $(b;summer)Golden Seelie Court$(), cause it can only be owned by the strongest court!
...right....the Shadow Court....
uhm......maybe we should $(b;spring)find$() a $(b;spring)Librarian$() who can give us access to ancient books.

Due to our latest victory and offering we where selected as one of the few to go on a mission to retrieve the $(b;summer)Elytra$(). We are not to return without it, or punishment awaits us!

Hope my faith in you was just! Let's look for information about the Shadow Court!
